spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit receives a +3 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit receives a +6 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks
spells.expert_level: All friendly units receives a +6 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks

spells.name: Curse
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit inflicts minimum damage when it attacks
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit inflicts ((80% of their minimum damage) - 1) when it attacks
spells.expert_level: All enemy units inflict ((80% of their minimum damage) - 1) when they attack

spells.name: Protection From Fire
spells.basic_level: Damage from Fire Magic spells is reduced by 30% for target, allied troop
spells.advanced_level: Damage from Fire Magic spells is reduced by 50% for target, allied troop
spells.expert_level: Damage from Fire Magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops

spells.name: Blind
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit is frozen until they are attacked. Deactivating attack is retaliated at 50% of base attack rating
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit is frozen until they are attacked. Deactivating attack is retaliated at 25% of base attack rating
spells.expert_level: One enemy target unit is frozen until they are attacked. Deactivating attack is not retaliated

spells.name: Fire Wall
spells.basic_level: A two hex wide wall of fire is produced at target hex. A troop passing through these hexes takes ((Power x 10) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that wall of fire is three hexes wide and damage is ((Power x 10) +20)
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except that damage is ((Power x 10) + 50)

spells.name: Fireball
spells.basic_level: Troops in target hex and its surrounding hexes take ((Power x 10) + 15) damage
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that damage is ((Power x 10) + 30)
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that damage is ((Power x 10) + 60)

spells.name: Land Mine
spells.basic_level: Landmines are placed in four random hexes on the battlefield. A troop stepping on a mine takes ((Power x 10) + 25) damage. Enemy creatures battling on their native terrain can see the mines and can cross them safely. To all others they are invisible
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that six mines are placed, and damage is ((Power x 10) + 50)
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that six mines are placed, and damage is ((Power x 10) + 100)

spells.name: Misfortune
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit's luck rating is reduced by one
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit's luck rating is reduced by two
spells.expert_level: All enemy units' luck rating are reduced by two

spells.name: Armageddon
spells.basic_level: All troops take ((Power x 50) + 30) points of damage
spells.advanced_level: All troops take ((Power x 50) + 60) points of damage
spells.expert_level: All troops take ((Power x 50) + 120) points of damage

spells.name: Berserk
spells.basic_level: Target attacks nearest troop. All creatures in a 1 hex radius affected
spells.advanced_level: Target attacks nearest troop. All creatures in a 2 hex radius (7 hexes total) affected
spells.expert_level: Target attacks nearest troop. All creatures in a 3 hex radius (19 hexes total) affected

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.basic_level: 20% of hand-to-hand damage inflicted on target, allied troop is counter-inflicted on attackers of the troop
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect except that 25% of damage is counter-inflicted
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect except that 30% of damage is counter-inflicted

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.basic_level: One friendly unit's attack rating is increased by 100% of the troop's defense rating, and its defense rating is reduced to zero
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except attack rating is increased to 150% of the troop's defense rating
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except attack rating is increased to 200% of the troop's defense rating

spells.name: Inferno
spells.basic_level: Strikes target hex, and all hexes within two hexes for ((Power x 10) + 20) damage
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that damage is ((Power x 10) + 40)
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that damage is ((Power x 10) + 80)

spells.name: Slayer
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit's attack rating is increased by eight against behemoths, dragons, and hydras
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that attack bonus also affects devils and angels
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except attack bonus also affects titans

spells.name: Sacrifice
spells.basic_level: Target, non-undead troop is sacrificed (destroyed). Then another target troop has ((Power + destroyed unit's creature base Health + 3) x # of creatures sacrificed) in health total of creatures returned to life
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that health total of creatures resurrected is ((Power + destroyed unit's creature base Health + 6) x # of creatures sacrificed)
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that health total of creatures resurrected is ((Power + destroyed unit's creature base Health + 10) x # of creatures sacrificed)

spells.name: Summon Fire Elemental
spells.basic_level: A troop containing (Power x 2) fire elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 3) fire elementals are summoned
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 4) fire elementals are summoned
